text: Juba II was a king of Numidia. He lived from 52 or 50 BC to AD 23. His wife was Cleopatra Selene II. She was the daughter of Queen Cleopatra VII of Egypt and Mark Antony. He died in Mauretania. Category:50s BC births Category:23 deaths Category:Kings and queens Category:Berber people
title: Juba II
